cv.description: I'm a highly motivated and adaptable fast learner with a strong passion for programming and cybersecurity, specialized on backend programming with full-stack capabilities.

softSkills: Excellent time management and communication skills
Used to the Agile methodology and teamwork
Open-mindeded and adaptable to new circumstances
techSkills: Used to work with various design patterns
Extensive Java backend experience (Spring, Quarkus, Hibernate, Tomcat, JSP, Thymeleaf, etc.)
Excellent knowledge of NodeJs, ExpressJs, NextJs and Strapi
Good knowledge of various  SQL and noSql databases
Basic knowledge of common AWS services (Cognito, DynamoDB, S3, ElasticBeanstalk, EC2 ...)
Good Docker knowledge and basic DevOps experience
Good knowledge of common web applications vulnerabilities, testing methodology and popular penetration testing tools
Knowledge of Good knowledge of Linux fundamentals

descriptionList: Developed Java microservices using Quarkus framework
Automated third-party applications communication using Flask
Worked across multiple projects of varying sizes
Worked in a team but also developed and designed web applications independently
Experience with Spring, Spring Flow, JSP,Junit, Thymeleaf, Hibernate, SpringBoot, Maven and other java based technologies.
Integrated third party services such as Twilio, SendGrid
Worked with ExpressJs , ReactJs, NextJs and Strapi
Worked with numerous AWS services and Docker
Experience with basic DevOps procedures on Linux servers and AWS
Proposed and performed internal assessment of public-facing company web applications, reporting numerous serious issues to company executives
Maintained Java EE payroll software and customers' databases
Identified vulnerabilities in internal and enterprise software during downtimes
